tachyon.client.file

Class TachyonFileSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.client.file.AbstractTachyonFileSystem
      • tachyon.client.file.TachyonFileSystem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TachyonLineageFileSystem

    @PublicApi
public class TachyonFileSystem
extends AbstractTachyonFileSystem
    A TachyonFileSystem implementation including convenience methods as well as a streaming API to read and write files. This class does not access the master client directly but goes through the implementations provided in AbstractTachyonFileSystem. The create API for creating files is not supported by this TachyonFileSystem because the files should only be written once, thus getOutStream is sufficient for creating and writing to a file.

      • getInStream

        public FileInStream getInStream(TachyonFile file,
                       InStreamOptions options)
                         throws IOException,
                                TachyonException,
                                FileDoesNotExistException
        Gets a FileInStream for the specified file. The stream's settings can be customized by setting the options parameter. The caller should close the stream after finishing the operations on it.
        Parameters:
        file - the handler for the file to read
        options - the set of options specific to this operation
        Returns:
        an input stream to read the file
        Throws:
        IOException - if a non-Tachyon exception occurs
        TachyonException - if an unexpected Tachyon exception is thrown
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the given file does not exist

      • getOutStream

        public FileOutStream getOutStream(TachyonURI path)
                           throws IOException,
                                  TachyonException,
                                  FileAlreadyExistsException,
                                  InvalidPathException
        Convenience method for getOutStream(TachyonURI, OutStreamOptions) with default options.
        Throws:
        IOException
        TachyonException
        FileAlreadyExistsException
        InvalidPathException

      • getOutStream

        public FileOutStream getOutStream(TachyonURI path,
                         OutStreamOptions options)
                           throws IOException,
                                  TachyonException,
                                  FileAlreadyExistsException,
                                  InvalidPathException
        Creates a file and gets the FileOutStream for the specified file. If the parent directories do not exist, they will be created. This should only be called to write a file that does not exist. Once close is called on the output stream, the file will be completed. Append or update of a completed file is currently not supported.
        Parameters:
        path - the Tachyon path of the file
        options - the set of options specific to this operation
        Returns:
        an output stream to write the file
        Throws:
        IOException - if a non-Tachyon exception occurs
        TachyonException - if an unexpected Tachyon exception is thrown
        FileAlreadyExistsException - if there is already a file at the given path
        InvalidPathException - if the path is invalid

      • getOutStream

        @Deprecated
public FileOutStream getOutStream(long fileId,
                                    OutStreamOptions options)
                           throws IOException
        Deprecated. 
        Alternative way to get a FileOutStream to a file that has already been created. This should not be used. Deprecated in version v0.8 and will be removed in v0.9.
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        getOutStream(TachyonURI path, OutStreamOptions options)
